paper_abstract: Considered is a system of delay differential equations modeling a time-delayed connecting network of three neurons without self-feedback. We investigate the linear stability of the trivial solution and Hopf bifurcation of this system. The general formula for the direction, the estimation formula of period and stability of Hopf bifurcating periodic solution are also given. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Linear stability and Hopf bifurcation in a three-unit neural network with two delays
